TopicTitle: Building Rockets in the VAB problems

Articles.Content: I have a problem getting my rockets and planes to appear as one piece. instead they have gaps between the individual parts. Anyone run into this? my mods are mechjeb2, KW Rocketry, B9 rocket pack and space station
Were they imported from an old version of KSP? Or have you recently updated any mods? Both can cause this problem. Also, you might want to read this.
